analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale._verify (/unique_contracts/0xec46f8207d766012454c408de210bcbc2243e71c.sol#339-358):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_addr,weiTokensOwed[_addr] + satTokensOwed[_addr]) (/unique_contracts/0xec46f8207d766012454c408de210bcbc2243e71c.sol#347-352)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- satOwed (/unique_contracts/0xec46f8207d766012454c408de210bcbc2243e71c.sol#356)
	- satTokensOwed (/unique_contracts/0xec46f8207d766012454c408de210bcbc2243e71c.sol#357)
